full_summary:
# Tender Announcement and Request for Proposals
## Request for Proposals against Supply Arrangement
### Reference Number and Solicitation Number
* Reference Number: cb-7-26018067
* Solicitation Number: W3162-23-F025-A

### Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date and Time: September 30, 2023, at 11:59 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* Tender Description: The Canadian Armed Forces require various electrical equipment to resupply consumable line stores and support the expansion of Op REASSURANCE. The following items are required:
	+ Lighting Fixtures and Accessories
	+ Electrical Equipment and Components and Supplies
	+ Electrical Wire Management Devices and Accessories and Supplies
* Amended List of Electrical Items:
	+ 5PGs of 50, 47613-EZC, EZ-RJ45 Connectors
	+ 2PGs of 100, 100026B, EZ-RJ12/11 Connectors
	+ 50, T70ECIW, Panduit End Cap Fitting
	+ 50, T70ICIW, Panduit Inside Corner
	+ 5, RGRB19U, Busbar Kit - Panduit
	+ 5PGs of 100, FLCSSBUY-C, Opticam LC 5M Prepolished Simplex Fiber Optic Connector
	+ 25, F92ERLNLNSNM001, Opti-Core 2 Fiber Patch Cord
	+ 25, F92ELLNLNSNM001, OS2 2F 1.6MM Patch Cord
	+ 25, F92ERLNLNSNM002, Opti-Core 2 Fiber Patch Cord
	+ 25, F92ELLNLNSNM002, OS2 2F 1.6MM Patch Cord
	+ 25, F92ERLNLNSNM003, 3M/10FT Singlemode Duplex LC/9 Micron Fiber Cable
	+ 2, 197951, Fiber Splice Closure
	+ 6, 97951, Splice Closure
	+ 2 Cases of 100 Rolls, 7100047911, Scotch Vinyl Electrical Tape Super 88
	+ 20, TZEFX231, P-Touch Tape
	+ 10, AX103255, CAT6+ KeyConnect Patch Panel
	+ 10, AX103253, CAT
